module.name: ACR
module.description: Scripting and programming with the ACR

link.text: Download ACR Interface Classes and Javadoc
link.tooltipText: Call ACR from java using JavaRMI
Online documentation of the ACR interface

link.text: Commandline Utilities and Examples in Python
link.toolTipText: A collection of commandline scripts - useful in their own right, and examples of python scripting of the workbench
Perl scripts that show how to connect to workbench. For details of functionality, see python examples.
